sentences.sContent: A hungry wolf's attempts to fatten a chicken for his stewpot have unexpected results.
sentences.sContent_eng: A hungry wolf's attempts to fatten a chicken for his stewpot have unexpected results.
sentences.sCn: 一条饥饿的狼想把鸡养肥来做炖鸡，却产生了意想不到的结果。

sentences.sContent: New heat-resistant stewpot and tableware stand proudly without peer in this generation.
sentences.sContent_eng: New heat-resistant stewpot and tableware stand proudly without peer in this generation.
sentences.sCn: 本厂新产品，耐高温炖盅餐具，堪称旷世无双。

sentences.sContent: Once the instru-ments are worn out, the musicians, and a conductor who doubles as cook, toss each onesintosa stewpot to make soup -- to be enjoyed by the audience after the concert.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once the instru-ments are worn out, the musicians, and a conductor who doubles as cook, toss each onesintosa stewpot to make soup -- to be enjoyed by the audience after the concert.
sentences.sCn: 这些乐器若是用坏了,乐手们和指挥(他还兼厨师)就把它们扔到锅里做汤,在音乐会之后让观众们享用。
